About.HotelDescription: Centrally located in the city, The Langham, New York, Fifth Avenue is a convenient base for all your big city adventures. Iconic cultural attractions and shopping destinations, like The Grand Central Station and Times Square, are just a short walk away.

Reviews.HotelReview: We have just had 5 nights in Barcelona and stayed at hotel market for one night. First impressions were great, entrance is impressive with the boutique style and lovely restaurant and then we went to our room....this is where is was all a bit random, there was a pillar right in front of the door which was weird, a massive picture at the end of the bed which was freaky and beds so hard it was like sleeping on wood. We tried to have a nap when we arrived but there was drilling etc going on somewhere in the hotel. Shower is also mixer so you have to spend ages getting the right temperature. Would I stay there again? Probably not, however it was cheap and actually nothing really bad but just a little random. Staff I must say were great, extremely friendly and helpful :)

We had an excellent stay at this hotel during the Catalan Day weekend. Location is great, service outstanding. The pool and bar at the top floor were great and the service was outstanding and vert friendly. Will certainly go back next time
NICE :)

About.HotelDescription: Hotel Elysee welcomes guests of all abilities. Our building entrance, registration desk, elevator, rooms and suites are ADA compliant in accordance with the construction statutes of the ADA (Department of Justice ADA Title III Regulation 28 CFR Part 36, 1991). For more information about accessible and non-accessible features, please see our Accessibility Statement.

About.HotelDescription: Since its debut on October 1st, 1907, The Plaza Hotel has remained a New York icon hosting world leaders, dignitaries, captains of industry, Broadway legends and Hollywood royalty.  As an established staple for lavish society affairs, and blockbuster films, The Plaza has welcomed guests from around the world to enjoy its magic at the castle on Central Park South for more than 100 years.

Reviews.HotelReview: I had a wonderful experience at the (HN). Every staff member I encountered, from the valet to the check- in to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help! Thank you! Will recommend to my colleagues!
Overall, I had a great experience with the (HN); staff was incredibly helpful, and the amenities were great. The room was wonderful, clean, and perfect to celebrate a birthday weekend.
The staff at this property are all great! They all go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Please (HN) give your staff awards!

About: Plaza Kings are located on floors 5-19 and provide elegant accommodations with a comfortable sitting area.  Each of these exceptional New York City hotel rooms features a bathroom finished with inlaid earth stone mosaics in floral motifs, with a bathtub as well as separate shower.  Bathroom details include 24-carat gold plated Sherle Wagner faucets and accessories, and hand crafted solid white marble vanities.

The luxurious Deluxe King is exceptionally spacious with a comfortable sitting area. The bathroom is finished with inlaid “earth stone” mosaics in floral motifs, with a bathtub as well as separate shower. Bathroom details include 24-carat gold plated Sherle Wagner faucets and accessories with hand crafted solid white marble vanities. These well-appointed rooms are located throughout the hotel on floors 5 to 19.

The Terrace Room King features a private terrace, a King bed, and a deluxe bathroom.  Bathroom is finished with inlaid earth stone mosaics and include a luxurious bathtub and a separate shower.  Among many splendid details are 24-carat gold-plated Sherle Wagner fixtures, as well as hand-crafted solid white marble vanities.

Location.Place: Two East 55th Street, at Fifth Avenue

About.HotelDescription: Since its founding by John Jacob Astor over a century ago, The St. Regis New York has established itself as one of midtown Manhattan's best luxury hotels. Our historic 5-star hotel on Fifth Avenue has evolved to reflect the rich heritage of St. Regis while infusing the timeless elegance that has come to define it. Every element of the hotel is carefully considered, from the richly decorated rooms and

Reviews.HotelReview: Quaint downtown hotel with super friendly staff and beautifully clean rooms. The restaurant downstairs has amazing food!
26. Loved the Downtown Location and Atmosphere. Just about name it and you’re within walking distance.

25. Beautiful downtown hotel with nice roof top bar. Rooms have historic feel with old hard wood floors, yet modern as bathrooms have white subway tiles with TVs in each bathroom. Staff is wonderful and accommodating providing upgrades when available.

About: Experience sophisticated Parisian glamour with this spectacularly chic suite that offers privacy, luxury and exquisitely designed accommodations. This iconic suite exhibits the elegance of Dior, along with signature 24 hour St. Regis Butler Service, offering complimentary services including Butler served tea or coffee upon arrival and following daily wake-up call, pressing of up to 2 items per guest

Unwind in this chic suite with engaging design of Milan and exceptional Fifth Avenue views. The stylish Milano Suite, with views of Fifth Avenue, features natural colors and rich textiles, and offers access to our signature 24 hour Butler service offering complimentary services including Butler served tea or coffee upon arrival and following daily wake-up call, pressing of up to 2 items per guest upon...

A collaboration between St. Regis and Bentley Motors, the 15th-floor Bentley Suite exudes the luxury, craftsmanship, and style associated with both renowned international brands. Guests of the Bentley Suite will enjoy our signature 24 hour Butler service offering complimentary services including Butler served tea or coffee upon arrival and following daily wake-up call, pressing of up to 2 items

About.HotelDescription: The Beverly Hills Hotel is an iconic luxury hotel located in the heart of Beverly Hills. Known for its glamour and exclusivity, the hotel has been a favorite of Hollywood stars and high society for over a century. With luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and a range of amenities, the Beverly Hills Hotel offers a truly unforgettable experience.

Reviews.HotelReview: The Beverly Hills Hotel is truly amazing. The service is top-notch, the rooms are luxurious, and the amenities are excellent. I had a wonderful stay here and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-end hotel experience.

The Beverly Hills Hotel is definitely a classic. The rooms are comfortable and well-appointed, and the service is excellent. The only downside is that it can be quite expensive, but if you're looking for luxury, it's worth it.

I've stayed at a lot of high-end hotels, but the Beverly Hills Hotel is truly something special. The attention to detail is incredible, and the staff goes above and beyond to make sure you have a great experience. Highly recommended!

Policies: Cancellation policy: 24 hours prior to arrival

About: Our Deluxe King Room features a comfortable king-size bed, a cozy sofa bed, and a spacious bathroom with a shower. Enjoy your morning coffee in the seating area while watching your favorite show on the LCD TV. This room also includes complimentary Wi-Fi and daily breakfast.

Indulge in our Executive Suite, featuring a luxurious king-size bed, a spacious living room with a comfortable sofa and LCD TV, and a kitchenette for your convenience. The suite also includes complimentary Wi-Fi and daily breakfast, but is non-refundable. Relax and unwind in style during your stay at our Californian Hotel.

Our Deluxe Double Room is perfect for families or groups of friends, featuring two comfortable double beds, a cozy armchair, and a spacious bathroom with a shower. Watch your favorite show on the LCD TV or catch up on work with complimentary Wi-Fi. This room also includes daily breakfast.

HotelName: Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills

About.HotelDescription: The Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is a luxurious five-star hotel located in the heart of Beverly Hills. The hotel offers guests stunning views of the city and an array of amenities including a rooftop pool, a full-service spa, and a fitness center. The hotel's rooms and suites are elegant and spacious, featuring marble bathrooms and private balconies with views of the city or the Hollywood Hills.
About.SpecialTags: Luxury, Elegance, Rooftop Pool, Beverly Hills

Reviews.HotelReview: The Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is a top-notch hotel with impeccable service. The rooms are spacious and luxurious, with breathtaking views of the city. The rooftop pool is a must-visit, and the spa is the perfect place to relax after a long day. Highly recommended!

The Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is a beautiful hotel in a great location. The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The only downside is that it can be quite expensive, but if you're looking for luxury, it's worth it.

I recently stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills and it was an amazing experience. The hotel is beautiful, the staff is friendly and helpful, and the amenities are excellent. I especially enjoyed the rooftop pool with its stunning views of the city. Highly recommended!

Policies: Cancellation policy: 24 hours prior to arrival

About: This room offers a comfortable king bed, a sofa bed for extra sleeping space, and an LCD TV for entertainment. The bathroom features a shower and luxury amenities. Guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi and breakfast during their stay.

This spacious suite offers a separate living room and bedroom, both featuring an LCD TV for entertainment. The bathroom boasts both a shower and a tub, as well as luxury amenities. Guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi and breakfast during their stay.

This room offers a comfortable king bed and an LCD TV for entertainment. The bathroom boasts both a shower and a tub, as well as luxury amenities. Guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi and breakfast during their stay, as well as exclusive access to the Club Lounge, which features a private check-in, daily culinary presentations, and evening cocktails and bites.

About.HotelDescription: El Grand Hotel Palace es un lujoso hotel de 5 estrellas situado en el corazón de Roma, cerca de las principales atracciones turísticas de la ciudad, como la Fontana di Trevi y el Coliseo. El hotel cuenta con elegantes habitaciones y suites, un restaurante gourmet, un spa y un centro de fitness.

Reviews.HotelReview: El hotel es simplemente espectacular, todo es de primera calidad. El personal es muy amable y servicial. La habitación era amplia y cómoda, con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.
El hotel está muy bien ubicado y es muy lujoso. El servicio es excelente y las habitaciones son muy cómodas. El único inconveniente es el precio, que es bastante elevado.
Este hotel es simplemente excepcional. El personal es muy amable y servicial, y las instalaciones son de primera categoría. La ubicación es perfecta para explorar la ciudad.

Policies: No se permite fumar en las habitaciones
El check-in es a las 14:00 y el check-out es a las 12:00

About: Grand Hotel Palace offers spacious and elegantly furnished rooms and suites, providing guests with a luxurious and comfortable stay.

About: Grand Hotel Palace is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Rome, just a few steps away from the Spanish Steps and the Trevi Fountain.

About: Grand Hotel Palace offers spacious and elegantly furnished rooms and suites, providing guests with a luxurious and comfortable stay.

About.HotelDescription: El Hotel Eden es un lujoso hotel de 5 estrellas ubicado en el corazón de Roma. Ofrece vistas panorámicas de la ciudad y un servicio excepcional.

Reviews.HotelReview: Increíble hotel, muy elegante y cómodo. El servicio es excepcional y las vistas desde la terraza son impresionantes.
Mi estancia en el Hotel Eden fue maravillosa. El personal es muy amable y el hotel está impecablemente limpio. Las vistas desde la habitación son impresionantes.
No puedo decir suficientes cosas buenas sobre el Hotel Eden. La ubicación es perfecta y las vistas son impresionantes. El personal es excepcionalmente amable y servicial. Definitivamente volveré.

Policies: Check-in a partir de las 15:00 horas

About: Habitación amplia y cómoda con vistas a la ciudad. Incluye acceso al spa y desayuno continental
Habitación elegante con cama doble o dos camas individuales, con vistas a la ciudad o al jardín del hotel.

The Hotel Eden is an iconic hotel in the heart of Rome, with breathtaking views over the city. It is a perfect base from which to explore the city's many attractions, or simply relax in the luxurious surroundings.
Facility: Rooftop bar with panoramic views of Rome

About.HotelDescription: El Hotel Artemide es un lujoso hotel de 4 estrellas situado en el corazón de Roma. Ofrece habitaciones elegantes y modernas, un centro de bienestar, un restaurante y un bar. El hotel se encuentra a pocos minutos de los principales lugares de interés de Roma, como la Fontana di Trevi, la Escalinata de la Plaza de España y el Coliseo.

Reviews.HotelReview: Fantástico hotel en el corazón de Roma. Habitaciones amplias y limpias, personal muy amable y un delicioso desayuno. Altamente recomendado.
Muy buen hotel. Me encantó la ubicación y el personal es muy atento. Las habitaciones son cómodas y el desayuno es excelente.

Buena opción de alojamiento en Roma. El hotel está bien ubicado, cerca de la estación de tren y de varios lugares de interés. La habitación era cómoda y limpia, aunque un poco pequeña. El personal era amable y servicial.

About: Located in the heart of Rome, Hotel Artemide is a luxurious 4-star hotel featuring modern amenities and elegant decor. The hotel is housed in a historic building and is within walking distance of many of Rome's most famous attractions.
Facility: Rooftop terrace with panoramic views of Rome

About: Hotel Artemide offers a unique experience in the heart of Rome. The hotel combines contemporary design with traditional Italian hospitality, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The hotel's central location makes it easy to explore the city's many attractions.
Facility: Rooftop terrace with panoramic views of Rome

About.HotelDescription: Este lujoso hotel en un edificio del siglo XIX se encuentra a 9 minutos a pie de la Piazza di Spagna y a 1,6 km del Coliseo. Las habitaciones elegantes tienen techos altos y obras de arte, además de minibar, televisión y conexión Wi-Fi gratuita. Algunas tienen balcones y vistas a la ciudad. Las suites incluyen zonas de estar separadas; una tiene una bañera con patas y otra cuenta con una terraza con jacuzzi. El desayuno buffet se sirve en un elegante comedor, mientras que el bar del vestíbulo ofrece bebidas y aperitivos. Hay un gimnasio y un centro de negocios.

Reviews.HotelReview: Excelente servicio, habitaciones espaciosas y cómodas, muy bien ubicado. Sin duda volvería.
El hotel es increíble, la ubicación, el servicio y las habitaciones son excepcionales, solo el precio es un poco alto.
Estuvimos muy contentos con nuestra estancia en este hotel. Todo fue perfecto, desde el registro hasta la salida. Las habitaciones son muy bonitas y cómodas.

About: The Splendide Royal Roma is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Rome. The hotel is housed in a restored 19th-century palace and features elegant rooms and suites with stunning views of the city.

The Junior Suite is a spacious room with a separate living area and a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay. Guests can enjoy a range of in-room amenities, including free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and tea and coffee making facilities.

The hotel also features a fitness center and spa, as well as a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views of the city. Whether you're visiting Rome for business or pleasure, the Splendide Royal Roma is the perfect place to stay.

The Deluxe Suite at the Splendide Royal Roma is the ultimate luxury experience. This spacious suite features a separate living area, a private balcony with stunning views of Rome, and a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay.

Guests can enjoy a range of in-room amenities, including free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and tea and coffee making facilities. The suite also includes access to the hotel's fitness center and spa, as well as a round-trip airport transfer.
Whether you're visiting Rome for business or pleasure, the Deluxe Suite at the Splendide Royal Roma is the perfect place to stay.

About.HotelDescription: Located at the top of the Spanish Steps, the Hotel Hassler Roma offers elegant rooms and suites, a panoramic restaurant, and a luxury spa.

Reviews.HotelReview: The Hotel Hassler Roma exceeded our expectations. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, the room was spacious and luxurious, and the view from the rooftop restaurant was breathtaking.
We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Hassler Roma. The location was perfect, the room was comfortable and clean, and the breakfast was delicious. The only downside was the high price.

My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Hassler Roma for our anniversary and it was wonderful. The staff went out of their way to make our stay special, the room was beautiful, and the spa treatments were top-notch.

The hotel features elegant rooms and suites, each with its own unique character and charm. Guests can enjoy a range of amenities, including a fitness center, a spa, and a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views of the city.
Whether you're visiting Rome for business or pleasure, the Hassler Roma is the perfect place to stay.

About.HotelDescription: El Hotel Metropol de México se encuentra en el centro de la Ciudad de México, ubicado a solo unos pasos de la Alameda Central, el Palacio de Bellas Artes y a 5 min. del Zócalo.

Reviews.HotelReview: Para ser domingo a media noche los recepcionistas nos trataron bien. Tiene un estacionamiento muy seguro. Las recámaras, un poco pasadas de moda, pero para el precio está perfecto, no huele mal, pero tampoco bien, se escucha un poco el ruido de las habitaciones, las camas son cómodas
El lugar está bastante céntrico sin problema para registrarse. Limpio. Solo un tanto ruidoso los alrededores.
Hotel muy céntrico, lo mejor es la ubicación. El precio no es caro comparando con los alrededores, pero le sobran estrellas..

About: Cómoda habitación para dos personas en viaje de negocios o placer. El Hotel esta ubicado en el corazón de la zona Rosa en la Ciudad de México

About.HotelDescription: Un espacio tranquilo ubicado en pleno centro histórico de CDMX. Las 85 habitaciones del hotel Castropol son dormitorios diseñados para ofrecerte el mejor descanso durante tus vacaciones, en un ambiente seguro, limpio y cómodo.

Reviews.HotelReview: Muy buena ubicación bien céntrico y cercano al metro y parada de autobuses. El restaurante ofrece variedad de platos y tiene buenos precios.
Todo muy bueno y limpio lástima que aun haya un poco de mal servicio en el restaurante (aclaro no todos solo como dos de las personas que laboran allí)

Magnífica ubicación cerca del centro histórico y con muy buena oferta de transporte público a unos pasos, personal amable, instalaciones limpias, comida sabrosa a precio accesible en el restaurante y ambiente familiar.

About: Las habitaciones dobles estándar del hotel Castropol son estancias acogedoras de 15m2 con capacidad para dos personas

card.RoomName: Habitación Doble Estandar Con Camas Dobles

About: Las habitaciones dobles estándar con dos camas dobles del hotel Castropol te ofrecen un extra de espacio en tus vacaciones. Con una capacidad máxima de hasta 4 personas.

Location.Place: Av. José Martí No. 178, Escandón I Secc, Miguel Hidalgo

About.HotelDescription: Relájate, conoce y disfruta de una experiencia diferente de hospedaje. Todas las habitaciones en Kali Escandón  se encuentran diseñadas para ofrecerte una estancia perfecta, con todas las comodidades y exigencias del mundo actual, pero con un toque de lujo y exclusividad que te mereces.

Reviews.HotelReview: Este hotel siempre me ha quedado bien. Aparte de que esta muy limpio, amplio y cómodo, está bien ubicado, tiene precios contenidos y el bufete que incluyen para el desayuno es bueno

Me encanta, me he hospedado en varias ocasiones y el servicio es muy bueno, las habitaciones son grandes y las camas súper cómodas, el personal muy amable, lo súper recomiendo, tiene estacionamiento gratis =)

Excelente precio, la habitación enorme con todo lo necesario y una cama cómoda, el único pero que le pongo fue su personal del restaurante que no ofrecieron un buen servicio, fuera de ello, todo muy bien

About: Si lo que necesitas es realajarte pero viajas en familia, tenemos la habitacion perfecta para ti, nuestras unicas 2 Junior Suite Doble con Jacuzzi, disponen de 2 magnificas camas king size y un amplio jacuzzi

Con una ubicación privilegiada, principalmente en las esquinas del hotel, nuestras 14 Habitaciones Premier Doble (31 m2.) disponen de dos camas matrimoniales, aire acondicionado, calefaccion, cafetera, TV 45’’, Bluetooth play music, Internet Wifi gratis y detalles de lujo.

Nuestra Kali Suite cuenta con una cama king size, jacuzzi al aire libre, amplia terraza e impresionante vista panorámica de la CDMX. Esta lujosa habitación te sorprenderá con su inigualable diseño, brindando espacios creados con un excelente gusto y calidez contemporánea

About.HotelDescription: En el corazón de la histórica Ciudad de México, sobre el majestuoso Paseo de la Reforma, este icónico hotel estilo Art Decó cuenta con la mejor ubicación que nos permite disfrutar de las riquezas culturales gastronómicas y de una impecable belleza natural a sólo pasos del bosque y castillo de Chapultepec. Rodeado de las principales torres de negocios de la cosmopolita ciudad, disfrute de una experiencia única con la reconocida calidez de nuestro servicio.
About.SpecialTags: Member of The Leading Hotels of The World

Reviews.HotelReview: Un hotel digno de recomendar, si bien es cierto tiene sus años, sigue manteniendo un nivel de servicio alto con excelente atención al cliente, desde la entrada, elevadores y habitaciones super limpias

El hotel muy bonito, las habitaciones muy limpias, camas muy cómodas, clima al gusto, pantalla de televisión grande con muchos canales, etc, el personal de servicio muy atento y amable, el desayuno bufet estaba exquisito
Ampliamente recomendado, te hacen sentir muy bien, un servicio espectacular y las habitaciones también están muy bien

card.RoomName: Habitacion de Lujo 1 King o 2 Dobles

Master Suite Reforma de Lujo, 70 mts2. Esta habitación de tres módulos con una increíble vista panorámica de la Ciudad de México ofrece un perfecto ambiente tanto para un viaje de negocios como para una celebración especial
